attribs.name: background
attribs.current: Folk Hero (A celestial, fey, or similar creature gave me a blessing or revealed my secret origin.)

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.

I judge people by their actions, not their words.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Sincerity. There’s no good in pretending to be something I’m not. (Neutral)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: I have a family, but I have no idea where they are. One day, I hope to see them again.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVJQGwVZaIr65Ye4Zrp_description
attribs.current: You can cast a cleric spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag and you have the spell prepared.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVJQGwYOAvzqdOGJlKF_description
attribs.current: You have resistance to fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVJQGwZ0iS-rPWTXptv_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-MVJQGwZ0iS-rPWTXpty_description
attribs.current: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit in among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAV_itemcontent
attribs.current: These special tools include the items needed to pursue a craft or trade. Proficiency with a set of artisan's tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make using the tools in your craft. Each type of artisan's tools requires a separate proficiency.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAW_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Bludgeoning, Alternate Damage: 1d10, Alternate Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAX_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAY_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAY_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20,Critical Range: 20

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwaCVoPZRlMUtAZ_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwbXlig4O7tLtr0_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwbXlig4O7tLtr2_itemcontent
attribs.current: An iron pot can hold 1 gallon of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MVJQGwcqrNPjxMlv2hW_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwcqrNPjxMlv2hX_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwcqrNPjxMlv2hX_spelldescription
attribs.current: A ray of sickening greenish energy lashes out toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MVJQGwdCjzkkrtvFHD2_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwdCjzkkrtvFHD3_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwdCjzkkrtvFHD3_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwdCjzkkrtvFHD3_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGweRLMCKgUeizG0_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small bar of silver worth 15 sp, which the spell consumes

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGweRLMCKgUeizG0_spelldescription
attribs.current: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch has resistance to necrotic and psychic damage, and has advantage on saving throws against Void spells.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGweRLMCKgUeizG0_spelltarget
attribs.current: one willing creature you can touch

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MVJQGweRLMCKgUeizG1_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell enables you to create a copy of a one-page written work by placing a blank piece paper or parchment near the work that you are copying.  All the writing, illustrations, and other elements in the original are reproduced in the new document in your handwriting or drawing style.  The new medium must be large enough to accomodate the original source.  Any magical properties of the original aren't reproduced, so you can't use scribe to make copes of spell scrolls or magic books.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-MVJQGwfxHxNi4dohetJ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You grant a blessing to one deceased creature, enabling it to cross over to the realm of the dead in peace. A creature that benefits from bless the dead can’t become undead. The spell has no effect on living creatures or the undead.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-MVJQGwfxHxNi4dohetK_spelldescription
attribs.current: You awaken a spirit that resides inside an inanimate object such as a rock, a sign, or a table, and can ask it up to three yes-or-no questions. The spirit is indifferent toward you unless you have done something to harm or help it. The spirit can give you information about its environment and about things it has observed (with its limited senses), and it can act as a spy for you in certain situations. The spell ends when its duration expires or after you have received answers to three questions.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwfxHxNi4dohetL_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwfxHxNi4dohetN_itemcontent
attribs.current: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdII_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdIJ_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdIJ_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdIK_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdIL_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-MVJQGwgiU23iVl5GdIM_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.
